Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly a game-changer in its category. It comes with exceptional features and benefits that I believe you'll find invaluable. For this unique opportunity, I'm extending an exclusive offer of $120 for you to consider. This price reflects not only the quality of the product but also the value it can bring to your life. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need more information about how this product can enhance your experience. Looking forward to your consideration! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
